channel.title: Need someone to teach me how to code a rsps
channel.description:
Im bored and wanna learn to code but cant seem to get further then adding shops,and monsters and editing shops|
Anyone? let me know in comments

item.title: Need someone to teach me how to code a rsps
item.dc:creator: @ristorxious ristorxious
item.description:
@ristorxious wrote:

You want to learn Java? There are several resources online. Try MIT opencourseware(once you get a good grasp of the language they have a lot of good assignments to keep you nice and warm), books, reddit, code academy, etc. Keep in mind you’re not going to create a source in the near future or even edit more than 20% of the source you’re currently working on.

You want to learn how to create a rsps? Learn java and refer to previous question =/. You might also want to find a different motivation other than making a rsps IMO as well.

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone to teach me how to code a rsps
